entry.title: rperezll/ng-fast-toast: A fast and lightweight library for Angular 18+ that makes handling alerts and notifications effortless. Styled with Tailwind but built for production with a fully agnostic approach using Shadow DOM

entry.title: rekkitcwts/obs-overlay-python: A lightweight PNGTuber system for streamers, designed to work with OBS browser sources. Uses WebSockets to sync microphone input between devices without heavy 3D software.

entry.title: arifaura/todo: Todo is a lightweight, user-friendly task management application designed to help users efficiently organize, track, and prioritize their daily tasks. Built with modern web technologies, this project emphasizes simplicity, ease-of-use, and performance, making task management seamless whether you're at home or on the go.
entry.content: Todo is a lightweight, user-friendly task management application designed to help users efficiently organize, track, and prioritize their daily tasks. Built with modern web technologies, this project emphasizes simplicity, ease-of-use, and performance, making task management seamless whether you're at home or on the go.

entry.title: amalahammed/React-todo-list: A lightweight and user-friendly To-Do application built with React to help you stay organized and manage your tasks efficiently. This app allows you to add, view, and delete tasks seamlessly, making it a perfect tool for tracking your daily activities. With a clean and responsive design, it ensures a smooth user experience.

entry.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
entry.content: 🏠 A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
